com.cardconnect.consumersdk.androidpay

Class CCConsumerAndroidPayConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cardconnect.consumersdk.androidpay.CCConsumerAndroidPayConfiguration

  • public class CCConsumerAndroidPayConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Global configuration for Android Pay integration.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CCConsumerAndroidPayConfiguration getInstance()

      • isAndroidPayUiEnabled

        public boolean isAndroidPayUiEnabled()
        Checks if Android Pay UI is enabled on Consumer Sdk integrated views.
        Returns:
        true if Android Pay UI is enabled false otherwise.

      • setAndroidPayUiEnabled

        public void setAndroidPayUiEnabled(boolean androidPayUiEnabled)
        Sets Android Pay related UI on Consumer Sdk to be enabled or disabled. Needs to be set before launching Consumer Integrated UI. Additional set of this variable won't have any effect while Consumer integrated UI is shown.

      • getMerchantTransactionId

        public java.lang.String getMerchantTransactionId()
        Implementer's own unique identifier for Android Pay transaction. If defined, this identifier will be returned along with CCConsumerApiAndroidPayTokenResponse object. And cleared on this object afterwards.

      • setMerchantTransactionId

        public void setMerchantTransactionId(java.lang.String merchantTransactionId)
        Sets Implementer's own unique identifier for Android Pay transaction. Is null by default. If defined by implementer will be returned along with CCConsumerApiAndroidPayTokenResponse object. And cleared on this object afterwards.

      • isAllowDebitCard

        public boolean isAllowDebitCard()

      • setAllowDebitCard

        public void setAllowDebitCard(boolean allowDebitCard)

      • isAllowPrepaidCard

        public boolean isAllowPrepaidCard()

      • setAllowPrepaidCard

        public void setAllowPrepaidCard(boolean allowPrepaidCard)

      • getConfirmationFragmentStyle

        public com.google.android.gms.wallet.fragment.WalletFragmentStyle getConfirmationFragmentStyle()
        Gets Initial WalletFragmentStyle preferred style by the implementer for displaying Dialog Confirmation Detail Fragment from Android Pay on Consumer integrated UI.
        Returns:
        WalletFragmentStyle object defined.

      • setConfirmationFragmentStyle

        public void setConfirmationFragmentStyle(com.google.android.gms.wallet.fragment.WalletFragmentStyle confirmationFragmentStyle)
        Sets Initial WalletFragmentStyle preferred style by the implementer for displaying Dialog Confirmation Detail Fragment from Android Pay on Consumer integrated UI.
        Parameters:
        confirmationFragmentStyle - Preferred WalletFragmentStyle object.

      • getBuyWithAndroidButtonStyle

        @NonNull
public com.google.android.gms.wallet.fragment.WalletFragmentStyle getBuyWithAndroidButtonStyle()
        Gets Initial defined WalletFragmentStyle for displaying Buy with Android Pay Button on Consumer integrated UI if not set by implementer, applied style will be the following:


        WalletFragmentStyle.BuyButtonText#LOGO_ONLY
        WalletFragmentStyle.BuyButtonAppearance#ANDROID_PAY_DARK
        WalletFragmentStyle.Dimension#MATCH_PARENT

        Returns:
        WalletFragmentStyle object defined.

      • setBuyWithAndroidButtonStyle

        public void setBuyWithAndroidButtonStyle(@NonNull
                                         com.google.android.gms.wallet.fragment.WalletFragmentStyle buyWithAndroidButtonStyle)
        Sets Initial WalletFragmentStyle preferred style by the implementer for displaying Buy with Android Pay Button on Consumer integrated UI. If not specifically set by implementer, applied style will be the following:


        WalletFragmentStyle.BuyButtonText#LOGO_ONLY
        WalletFragmentStyle.BuyButtonAppearance#ANDROID_PAY_DARK
        WalletFragmentStyle.Dimension#MATCH_PARENT

        Parameters:
        buyWithAndroidButtonStyle - Preferred WalletFragmentStyle object.

      • isPhoneNumberRequired

        public boolean isPhoneNumberRequired()

      • setPhoneNumberRequired

        public void setPhoneNumberRequired(boolean phoneNumberRequired)

      • getAllowedCards

        @NonNull
public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getAllowedCards()
        Gets Allowed cards defined for Android Pay integration. If not specified by default the allowed cards will be:

        CCAndroidPayConstants.VISA
        CCAndroidPayConstants.DISCOVER
        CCAndroidPayConstants.JCB
        CCAndroidPayConstants.MASTERCARD
        CCAndroidPayConstants.OTHER
        See Also:
        CCAndroidPayConstants

      • setAllowedCards

        public void setAllowedCards(@NonNull
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> allowedCards)
        Set Allowed cards to use with Android Pay. If none of this cards happen to be set in Android Pay application consumer Sdk will not show Android Pay button.

      • isTestMode

        public boolean isTestMode()
        Checks whether android pay integration is on test or production mode. If is on test mode Authorization tokens won't be chargeable so implementer can test consumer Sdk with Android Pay integration and pre-purchase flow.

      • setTestMode

        public void setTestMode(boolean testMode)
        Set test mode to Android Pay integration. This value will be set by default to true. If the implementer had already fully tested the pre-purchase flow, authorization with Cardconnect and is ready to set testMode = false must follow these steps: https://developers.google.com/android-pay/deployment in order to give the application production access.

      • getMerchantName

        @NonNull
public java.lang.String getMerchantName()

      • setMerchantName

        public void setMerchantName(@NonNull
                            java.lang.String merchantName)
        Sets an optional merchant name to be displayed on any UI in the checkout flow. If omitted, the merchant display name configured in the merchant's account settings will be used.

      • getCCCurrency

        @NonNull
public com.cardconnect.consumersdk.androidpay.enums.CCCurrency getCCCurrency()

      • setCCCurrency

        public void setCCCurrency(@NonNull
                          com.cardconnect.consumersdk.androidpay.enums.CCCurrency CCCurrency)
